attributes.action: Restrict the use of cash during caronavirus outbreak.
attributes.additional_details: Help restrict the spread of caronavirus.
attributes.background: Cash carries all sorts of germs and is passed from one person to the next, and as such could be a risk in helping the spread of the virus. Therefore, would restrictions in using cash help prevent the spread of the virus.

rejection.details:
It is up to individual retailers or service providers to determine how they will accept payment for goods and services, not the Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
